p: We used quantitative real-time PCR (qRT-PCR) to detect the transcription level of RNAi target genes in H. armigera larvae that were infected by feeding with OBs for two days. The results showed that the mRNA level of HaJHAMT was suppressed in larvae infected with vHaBacΔegtdsJHAMT, in contrast to the control virus vHaBacΔegt ( Figure 5a). Similarly, we found decreased expression of HaJHBP in larvae infected with vHaBacΔegtdsJHBP ( Figure 5b).
